name: NWPath.Status
desc: Status values indicating whether a path can be used by connections.

items.name: case unsatisfied
items.desc: The path is not available for use.

items.name: case satisfied
items.desc: The path is available to establish connections and send data.

items.name: case requiresConnection
items.desc: The path is not currently available, but establishing a new connection may activate the path.

items.name: static func != (NWPath.Status, NWPath.Status) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
